solution_line_template: Gertrude has {gertrude_fleas} fleas and Olive has half that amount so Olive has {gertrude_fleas}/{half_divisor} = <<{gertrude_fleas}/{half_divisor}={olive_fleas}>>{olive_fleas} fleas

Maud has {maud_multiplier} times the amount of fleas as Olive who has {olive_fleas} fleas so Maud has {maud_multiplier}*{olive_fleas} = <<{maud_multiplier}*{olive_fleas}={maud_fleas}>>{maud_fleas} fleas

Gertrude has {gertrude_fleas} fleas, Maud has {maud_fleas} fleas and Olive has {olive_fleas} for a total of {gertrude_fleas}+{maud_fleas}+{olive_fleas} = <<{gertrude_fleas}+{maud_fleas}+{olive_fleas}={total_fleas}>>{total_fleas} fleas
